scripts.dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-http-header-size=24576' next dev -p 3000 & nodemon --watch config.ts --exec 'yarn compute-tree && sleep 4 && ./script/bash/log.sh'
scripts.register-root: cast rpc anvil_impersonateAccount 0xCA0583A6682607282963d3E2545Cd2e75697C2bb --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 && ETH_FROM=0xCA0583A6682607282963d3E2545Cd2e75697C2bb cast send 0x5449Cc7A7E4024a7192d70c9Ce60Bb823993fd81 --unlocked --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 'registerRoot(uint256)'
scripts.deploy-local: yarn deploy-dookies && yarn deploy-dookies-advertiser && yarn generate-abi
scripts.deploy-dookies-advertiser: forge script DeployDookiesAdvertiser --rpc-url http://localhost:8545/ -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
scripts.deploy-dookies: forge script DeployDookies --rpc-url http://localhost:8545/ -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
